No. 13. Part 1. No change in general situation, tribal attitude continues good. Chitral reports some Afghans holding position five miles above Arnawai. Small Afghan force still in Gandao valley, but reports and air reconnaissances indicate no important tribal gatherings there. Nadir Khan has distributed small quantity of ammunition to Afghan tribesmen on Southern Kohat border. Some sniping and wire cutting continues in Tochi. Reliable reports from..-Kandahar states no troops had left (?. there) up to 21st instant, but great military activity prevailed. Air raid on Jalalabad 21st instant reported most effective, troops and officials fled from town.
